node.statement: IMPRIMITIVITY: H_6 acts imprimitively on Ω = {1,...,6}. By Lemma 1, the partition B₀ = {{1,4}, {2,5}, {3,6}} is preserved setwise by each generator h₁, h₂, h₃. Since B₀ has 3 blocks of size 2 (a non-trivial partition where neither the blocks are singletons nor is B₀ the trivial partition into one block), H_6 acts imprimitively per definition Imprimitive_Action.
